query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PrivateInstance AS a WHERE a.privateType = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PrivateInstance AS a WHERE a.privateType = ?1 AND a.sopIuid = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM MWLItem AS a
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM MWLItem AS a WHERE a.requestedProcedureId = ?1 AND a.spsId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM MWLItem a where a.studyIuid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM VerifyingObserver AS o
SELECT OBJECT(d) FROM Device AS d
SELECT OBJECT(d) FROM Device AS d WHERE d.stationName = ?1
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(d) FROM Device d, IN(d.protocolCodes) p WHERE p = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM Media AS m WHERE m.mediaStatus = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(m) FROM Media AS m WHERE m.filesetIuid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PrivateStudy AS a WHERE a.privateType = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PrivateStudy AS a WHERE a.privateType = ?1 AND a.studyIuid = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PrivatePatient AS a WHERE a.privateType = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PrivatePatient AS a WHERE a.privateType = ?1 AND a.patientId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PrivatePatient AS a WHERE a.privateType = ?1 AND a.patientId = ?2 AND (a.issuerOfPatientId IS NULL OR a.issuerOfPatientId = ?3)
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Code AS a
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Code AS a WHERE a.codeValue = ?1 AND a.codingSchemeDesignator = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM HP AS o WHERE o.sopIuid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM MPPS AS a
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM MPPS AS a WHERE a.sopIuid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM MPPS a, IN(a.series) s where s.study.studyIuid = ?1
SELECT DISTINCT mpps.sopIuid FROM MPPS mpps, IN(mpps.series) s WHERE s.study.studyIuid = ?1
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(mpps) FROM MPPS mpps, IN(mpps.series) s WHERE s.study.studyIuid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Patient AS p
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Patient AS p WHERE p.patientId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Patient AS p WHERE p.patientId LIKE ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Patient AS p WHERE p.patientId = ?1 AND p.issuerOfPatientId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM Patient AS p WHERE p.patientId LIKE ?1 AND p.issuerOfPatientId = ?2

SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p1) FROM Patient AS p1, IN(p1.otherPatientIds) opid, IN(opid.patients) p2 WHERE (p1.patientId = ?1 AND p1.issuerOfPatientId = ?2) OR (p2.patientId = ?1 AND p2.issuerOfPatientId = ?2) OR (opid.patientId = ?1 AND opid.issuerOfPatientId = ?2)

SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(p1) FROM Patient AS p1, IN(p1.otherPatientIds) opid, IN(opid.patients) p2 WHERE (p1.patientId = ?1 AND p1.issuerOfPatientId = ?2) OR (p2.patientId = ?1 AND p2.issuerOfPatientId = ?2)
SELECT OBJECT(p1) FROM Patient AS p1, IN(p1.otherPatientIds) opid WHERE (opid.patientId = ?1 AND opid.issuerOfPatientId = ?2)
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM Instance AS i WHERE i.sopIuid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM Instance AS i WHERE i.media IS NULL AND i.series.study.createdTime < ?1
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM Instance AS i WHERE i.series.study.patient = ?1 AND i.sopCuid = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM Instance AS i WHERE i.series.study.patient = ?1 AND i.srCode = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM Instance AS i WHERE i.series.study.studyIuid = ?1 AND i.sopCuid = ?2 AND i.srCode.codeValue = ?3 AND i.srCode.codingSchemeDesignator = ?4
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM Instance AS i WHERE i.series.pk = ?1 ORDER BY i.pk
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM Instance AS i WHERE i.series.seriesIuid = ?1 ORDER BY i.pk
SELECT OBJECT(f) FROM File f WHERE f.instance.pk = ?1 AND f.fileSystem.pk = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(f) FROM File f WHERE f.instance.pk = ?1 AND f.fileSystem.pk = ?2 AND f.fileMd5Field = ?3
SELECT COUNT(f) FROM File f WHERE f.instance.pk = ?1 AND f.fileSystem.pk = ?2
SELECT DISTINCT f.fileSystem.retrieveAET FROM Instance i, IN(i.files) f WHERE i.pk = ?1
SELECT MIN(f.fileSystem.availability) FROM Instance i, IN(i.files) f WHERE i.pk = ?1
SELECT i.sopIuid FROM Instance as i WHERE i.series.study.studyIuid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM StudyPermission AS p WHERE p.studyIuid = ?1 AND p.action = ?2 AND p.role = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM StudyPermission AS p WHERE p.studyIuid = ?1 AND p.action = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM StudyPermission AS p WHERE p.studyIuid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(sp) FROM Patient p, IN(p.studies) s, StudyPermission sp WHERE p.pk = ?1 AND s.studyIuid = sp.studyIuid
SELECT s.studyIuid FROM Patient p, IN(p.studies) s WHERE p.pk = ?1
SELECT s.studyIuid FROM Patient p, IN(p.studies) s WHERE p.patientId = ?1
SELECT s.studyIuid FROM Patient p, IN(p.studies) s WHERE p.patientId = ?1 AND (p.issuerOfPatientId IS NULL OR p.issuerOfPatientId = ?2)
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM AE AS a
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM AE AS a WHERE a.title = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM AE AS a WHERE a.hostName = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM UPSSubscription AS s WHERE s.receivingAETitle = ?1 AND s.uPS.sopInstanceUID = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM UPSSubscription AS s WHERE s.receivingAETitle = ?1
SELECT s.receivingAETitle FROM UPSSubscription AS s WHERE s.uPS.sopInstanceUID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(fs) FROM FileSystem AS fs
SELECT OBJECT(fs) FROM FileSystem AS fs WHERE fs.directoryPath = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(fs) FROM FileSystem AS fs WHERE fs.groupID = ?1 AND fs.directoryPath = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(fs) FROM FileSystem AS fs WHERE fs.groupID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(fs) FROM FileSystem AS fs WHERE fs.groupID = ?1 AND fs.status = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(fs) FROM FileSystem AS fs WHERE fs.groupID = ?1 AND fs.status IN (0,1)
SELECT OBJECT(fs) FROM FileSystem AS fs WHERE fs.retrieveAET = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(fs) FROM FileSystem AS fs WHERE fs.retrieveAET = ?1 AND fs.availability = ?2 AND fs.status = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(fs) FROM FileSystem AS fs WHERE fs.retrieveAET = ?1 AND fs.availability = ?2 AND (fs.status = ?3 OR fs.status = ?4)
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM UPSGlobalSubscription AS s WHERE s.receivingAETitle = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM UPSGlobalSubscription AS s
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM GPSPSPerformer AS p
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM OtherPatientID AS o WHERE o.patientId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM OtherPatientID AS o WHERE o.patientId LIKE ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM OtherPatientID AS o WHERE o.patientId = ?1 AND o.issuerOfPatientId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM Series AS s
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(s) FROM Series s, IN(s.instances) i WHERE i.media = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM Series AS s WHERE s.seriesIuid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM Series AS s WHERE s.ppsIuid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM Series AS s WHERE s.ppsIuid IS NULL AND s.sourceAET = ?1 AND s.study.updatedTime < ?2
SELECT s.pk FROM Series s WHERE s.seriesStatus = ?1 AND s.updatedTime < ?2
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM Series s WHERE s.seriesStatus = ?1 AND s.updatedTime < ?2
SELECT DISTINCT i.retrieveAETs FROM Instance i WHERE i.series.pk = ?1
SELECT DISTINCT i.externalRetrieveAET FROM Instance i WHERE i.series.pk = ?1
SELECT DISTINCT i.media FROM Instance i WHERE i.series.pk = ?1 AND i.media.mediaStatus = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(f) FROM File f WHERE f.instance.series.pk = ?1 AND f.fileSystem.pk = ?2
SELECT COUNT(f) FROM File f WHERE f.instance.series.pk = ?1 AND f.fileSystem.pk = ?2
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(i) FROM Instance i, IN(i.files) f WHERE i.series.pk = ?1 AND f.fileSystem.pk = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(f) FROM File f WHERE f.instance.series.pk = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(sof) FROM StudyOnFileSystem sof WHERE sof.study=?1 AND sof.fileSystem=?2
SELECT OBJECT(sof) FROM StudyOnFileSystem sof WHERE sof.markedForDeletion = FALSE AND sof.study.studyIuid=?1 AND sof.fileSystem.groupID=?2

cmp-field.description: MD5 checksum of the original file (as it was received, before compression) as hex string

query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(f) FROM File AS f WHERE f.fileSystem.directoryPath = ?1 AND f.filePath LIKE ?2
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM SeriesRequest AS r
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM PublishedStudy o WHERE o.study.pk=?1 AND o.status=?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM PublishedStudy o WHERE o.study.studyIuid=?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM PublishedStudy o WHERE o.study.studyIuid=?1 AND o.status=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PrivateSeries AS a WHERE a.privateType = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PrivateSeries AS a WHERE a.privateType = ?1 AND a.seriesIuid = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(ups) FROM UPS AS ups WHERE ups.sopInstanceUID = ?1

SELECT OBJECT(ups) FROM UPS AS ups, IN(ups.refRequests) AS rq WHERE ups.stateAsInt = ?1 AND rq.requestedProcedureId = ?2 AND ups.scheduledWorkItemCode.codeValue = ?3 AND ups.scheduledWorkItemCode.codingSchemeDesignator = ?4 AND ups.scheduledWorkItemCode.codingSchemeVersion = ?5

SELECT OBJECT(ups) FROM UPS AS ups, IN(ups.refRequests) AS rq WHERE ups.stateAsInt = ?1 AND rq.requestedProcedureId = ?2 AND ups.scheduledWorkItemCode.codeValue = ?3 AND ups.scheduledWorkItemCode.codingSchemeDesignator = ?4
SELECT ups.sopInstanceUID FROM UPS AS ups WHERE ups.subscriptions IS EMPTY
SELECT OBJECT(gpsps) FROM GPSPS AS gpsps WHERE gpsps.sopIuid = ?1

SELECT OBJECT(gpsps) FROM GPSPS AS gpsps, IN(gpsps.refRequests) AS rq WHERE gpsps.gpspsStatusAsInt = ?1 AND gpsps.scheduledWorkItemCode.codeValue = ?2 AND gpsps.scheduledWorkItemCode.codingSchemeDesignator = ?3 AND rq.requestedProcedureId = ?4
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM Study AS s
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Study AS a WHERE a.studyIuid = ?1
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(st) FROM Study st, IN(st.series) s, IN(s.instances) i WHERE i.media = ?1
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(st) FROM Study st, IN(st.series) s, IN(s.instances) i WHERE i.media IS NULL and st.createdTime < ?1
SELECT DISTINCT s.retrieveAETs FROM Series s WHERE s.study.pk = ?1
SELECT DISTINCT i.externalRetrieveAET FROM Study st, IN(st.series) s, IN(s.instances) i WHERE st.pk = ?1
SELECT DISTINCT i.media FROM Study st, IN(st.series) s, IN(s.instances) i WHERE st.pk = ?1 AND i.media.mediaStatus = ?2
SELECT DISTINCT s.modality FROM Study st, IN(st.series) s WHERE st.pk = ?1
SELECT DISTINCT i.sopCuid FROM Study st, IN(st.series) s, IN(s.instances) i WHERE st.pk = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(f) FROM File f WHERE f.instance.series.study.pk = ?1 AND f.fileSystem.pk = ?2 ORDER BY f.pk
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT f) FROM File f WHERE f.instance.series.study.pk = ?1 AND f.fileSystem.pk = ?2
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(s) FROM Series s, IN(s.instances) i, IN(i.files) f WHERE s.study.pk = ?1 AND f.fileSystem.pk = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(f) FROM File f WHERE f.instance.series.study.pk = ?1
SELECT s.pk FROM Series s WHERE s.study.pk = ?1
SELECT Object(i) FROM Instance i WHERE i.series.study.pk = ?1 AND i.media IS NULL
SELECT DISTINCT st.pk FROM Study AS st, IN(st.series) s WHERE s.ppsIuid IS NULL AND s.sourceAET = ?1 AND st.updatedTime < ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM GPPPS AS a
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM GPPPS AS a WHERE a.sopIuid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM Issuer AS i WHERE i.localNamespaceEntityID = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(i) FROM Issuer AS i WHERE i.universalEntityID = ?1 AND i.universalEntityIDType = ?2
